subject: Baseball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Carlos Gómez is one new face whose play has kept the Twins in the American League Central race, even after center fielder Torii Hunter and pitcher Johan Santana left in the off-season.
snippet: Carlos Gómez is one new face whose play has kept the Twins in the American League Central race, even after center fielder Torii Hunter and pitcher Johan Santana left in the off-season.
